subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Testing
msgSnippet: ... What test did you try to write? Why didn t it work? Would it be easier if the test passed the Vector (please use List and not Vector -- this isn t JDK 1.1
messageBody:
vinod_c_in wrote:

> Hello experts,
> I am new to JUnit and need some help in using Junit.
> I need to test the following condition with junit.
> I have a class with one method which gets vector from another class
> and its then does some calculation based on the data in vector.
> How do I test this with junit.

What test did you try to write? Why didn't it work?

Would it be easier if the test passed the Vector (please use List and
not Vector -- this isn't JDK 1.1 anymore!) to the method that performed
the calculation?

--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
